reviewText: There were not very many attractive women. I thought the dvd was boring as hell. I would not advise purchasing this DVD.

I've loved some of the Wild Party Girls DVDs, but I'm very disappointed with their WINTERFEST UNCENSORED one. On a few other Wild Party Girls DVDs, the editors sometimes mess with the picture, but on WINTERFEST UNCENSORED it's totally out of control!! I mean stuff like discoloration, switching from one picture aspect to another like widescreen to full screen, out-of-focus shots, jerky image, rapidly repeating shots that don't deserve to be, and on and on. Does ANYONE like to watch this stuff??! Making things worse for me is an annoying rap soundtrack that's often going in the background. It's a shame, because there are some very good segments here, like the cute girl half naked at the service station, with an amazed customer driving up to take a look, and the girl flashing the camera in a department store. But overall this DVD is unwatchable to me. And I should note that it shows only topless shots, with no full frontal nudity, if that matters to you. Also, the title is a complete misnomer, because nothing on this DVD suggests wintertime. I was hoping to see girls at a ski lodge or some such as a change from the usual summertime beach ones. However, some other Wild Party Girls DVDs are GREAT, and some of my favorites are Wild Party Girls: Naked Spring Break and also Wild Party Girls: Summer Madness Tour and last but not least Wild Party Girls: Naked Boat Bash.

I've liked some of the Wild Party Girls DVDs, but I'm very disappointed with their WINTERFEST UNCENSORED one. On some of their other DVDs, the editors would go too far in messing with the picture, but on this one it's totally out of control! I mean stuff like discoloration, switching from one picture aspect to another like widescreen to full screen, out-of-focus shots, jerky image, rapidly repeating shots that don't deserve to be, and on and on. Does ANYONE like to watch this stuff??! Making things worse for me is an annoying rap soundtrack that's often going in the background. It's a shame, because there are some very good segments here, like the cute girl half naked at the service station, with an amazed customer driving up to take a look, and the girl flashing the camera in a department store. But overall this DVD is unwatchable to me. And I should note that it just shows topless shots, with no full frontal nudity, if that matters to you. Also, the title is a complete misnomer, because nothing on this DVD suggests wintertime. I was hoping to see girls at a ski lodge or some such as a change from the usual summertime beach ones. As I said, I've liked some of the Wild Party Girls DVDs, especially Wild Party Girls: Naked Spring Break, but I probably won't take a chance on getting any more after seeing this one.

this thing is an utter let-down, don't bother. It claims to be uncensored yet in the most obvious ways is I found it very annoying watching this piece of "entertainment".
j.
